attributes.action: Instruct his sports minister to use his Influence to Create United Kingdom national football team only and I mean only for the 2012 Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the bickering and self interest of all four of the home nation’s authorities and give the UK a team to be proud of for the people of the United Kingdom. This should be just for the duration of the 2012 games and no more. Give the people the right to see the best of the beautiful game from all four nations and also give all four nations equal recognition of their national flags on the team strip and not just the union flag.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
